summary: When Michael Peck's overbearing parents force him to compete in the science fair, he thinks he can shock everyone. Instead, Peck finds that teen angst might be cliché, but it still sucks.
cast: Keir Gilchrist|Marcia Cross|Adam Arkin|Camryn Manheim|Kyle Kaplan|Brie Larson|Tiya Sircar|Don McManus|Tom McGowan|John Prosky|Molly Hagan|Martin Spanjers|Justin Lee|Hayley Holmes|Drew Tyler Bell|Andrew McFarlane|Serena Berman|Kenny Stevenson|Haley Ramm|Dan Martin|Ellen David|Octavia Spencer|Peter Canaan|Michael DeLorenzo|Christopher De Lorenzo|Michael Hogan Jr.|Elizabeth Cohen|Ian Emanuel Driving|Daniel Smith Coleman|Courtney Fleming|Garret Gerlich|Austin Honaker|Adam Knapp|Javier Montoya|Angela Nikas|Pete Stamatelatos
keywords: know it all|tighty whities|science fair|senior|skipping school
title: Just Peck
